title: Clarifies effect on eligibility for medicaid of the execution of a waiver of the right of election by a medicaid applicant or recipient
summary: Clarifies effect on eligibility for medicaid of the execution of a waiver of the right of election by a medicaid applicant or recipient; codifies the rule that the period of ineligibility resulting from a waiver of right of election would begin on the date on which the waiver was signed, rather than the date of the spouse's death.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to medical assistance for needy persons
